comment.author: 58446043@N04
comment._content: This is not Dinosaur National Monument (beds are too soft and horizontal). Most likely along the Two Medicine River, Montana, an area worked by Gilmore.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you, ktneprac.  The slide is not labeled with any information except: "No. 5, 35152."  I changed the date in the description above to reflect the date listed in the finding aid.  The locality was also taken from the finding aid. I will forward your comment to someone in our Department of Paleobiology.  If there is agreement, then we will update the caption.  Thanks again!

sonoe
Field Book Project
